member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.GetAdminCartCompany(System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets the company details of the passed in company Id, secured by a security Fn
Adds a event product to the company cart.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.DeleteAdminCart(System.Int64)
member.summary: Completely deletes the current admin shopping cart.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.DeleteEventCartItem(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Removes the specified event item from the cart. This may result in multiple session items being removed, if removed the parent event product from cart

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.AdminEmptyCart(System.Int64)
member.summary: Removes all items from the admin cart.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.GetAllCartItems(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the common properties of all items in the cart. A cart item may have additional detail depending on its product type. Those details can be retrieved through the URL specified by the additionalDetails output field.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.GetAllEventsProducts(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the common properties of all event items in the cart.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.GetSingleEventProduct(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets all properties of a single event product item in the cart.
Sets top level fields on the cart such as the shipping and billing address or the coupon code.
Updates the properties of a single event product item in the cart. If the item specified is not an event product, this call would cause an error.
Completes the shopping experience using a purchase order for payment. The shopper must have the required credit approval limits.
Completes the shopping experience using a credit card for admin payment.
Completes the shopping experience using a saved payment for admin payment.
Completes the admin shopping experience using a ACH for admin payment.
Completes the admin shopping experience using a ACH for admin payment.
Completes the shopping experience using GPay for admin payment.
Completes the shopping experience using Apple Pay for admin payment.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.AdminCheckoutZeroPaymentOrder(System.Int64)
member.summary: Completes the admin payment process of zero payment orders

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.GetAllShipmentTypes(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the shipment types available.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.GetRemotePaymentRequestDataForCheckout(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves the remote payment request data for checkout.
Processes the remote payment response data for checkout.
Adds a subscription general product to the cart.
Updates the properties of a single subscription general product item in the cart. If the item specified is not a subscription general product this call will throw an error.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpoint.v1_Admin_adminCarts_adminShoppingCartEndpointController.AdminGetAllSubscriptionProducts(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the common properties of all subscription items in the cart.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.summary: Gets all properties of a single subscription product item in the cart.
